0: RESOLUTION REQUESTING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE ONLINE COMPANIES SUCH AS GRAB, LAZADA, SURPLUS, SHOPEE, AIR BNB, ANGKAS AND SUCH OTHER SIMILAR COMPANIES, AS TO WHETHER THEY ARE CORRECTLY PAYING THEIR TAXES AND TO DETERMINE HOW MUCH

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00685
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION REQUESTING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE ONLINE COMPANIES SUCH AS GRAB, LAZADA, SURPLUS, SHOPEE, AIR BNB, ANGKAS AND SUCH OTHER SIMILAR COMPANIES, AS TO WHETHER THEY ARE CORRECTLY PAYING THEIR TAXES AND TO DETERMINE HOW MUCH
